plot outline: Sahasra (Charmi) is a chorus singer struggling to make a career in playback singing. One night she goes to a wild party on the insistence of her fast-going girl friend (Pooja Bharati). A few days later she gets chased by unidentified men who try to murder her. The rest of the story is all about unveiling the mysterious happenings that occurred on that night where she went to party.
title: Anukokunda Oka Roju
plot: A woman with amnesia tries to unravel the mystery of the missing day in her life.

Sahasra (Charmi) is a chorus singer struggling to make a career in playback singing. One night she goes to a wild party on the insistence of her fast-going girl friend (Pooja Bharati). A few days later she gets chased by unidentified men who try to murder her. The rest of the story is all about unveiling the mysterious happenings that occurred on that night where she went to party.::ram

Forgetful Sahasra is employed as a singer at a TV Station, and lives by herself. On a Saturday night, she and her friend attend a discotheque, and the following morning Sahasra wakes up to nothing but chaos as she is told that it is not Sunday, but Monday. Sahasra sets about to find out what exactly happened after her Saturday night outing - and will soon find herself being confronted by assorted gangsters and strangers claiming to know her, as well as become suspect in two homicides that occurred on the same day that she is unable to account for.::rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)
